attributes.action: ban the sale of energy drinks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the dangers of highly-caffinated drinks are well documented,especially when combined with alchohol.symptoms include;aggression,paranoia,suicidal thoughts,memory loss,raised blood pressure,increased risk of stroke and heart attack and damage to the nervous system (to name but a few).this is backed by medical research,I feel these drinks are as detrimental to your health as smoking and serve to exaggerate the effects of alchohol and they should be banned ASAP.
